namespace FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.PropertyLevelSerializer;

public partial class PacketWithPropertySerializer : ISerializable<PacketWithPropertySerializer>
{
    public static int GetPacketSize(PacketWithPropertySerializer obj)
    {
        if (obj is null) return 0;
        var size = 0;
        size += sizeof(int); // Size for unmanaged type Id
        size += FourSer.Generated.Internal.__FourSer_Generated_Serializers.FourSer_Tests_GeneratorTestCases_PropertyLevelSerializer_MyCustomStringSerializer.GetPacketSize(obj.Name);
        size += StringEx.MeasureSize(obj.Description); // Size for string Description
        return size;
    }

    private PacketWithPropertySerializer(int id, string name, string description)
    {
        this.Id = id;
        this.Name = name;
        this.Description = description;
    }

    public PacketWithPropertySerializer()
    {
        this.Id = default;
        this.Name = default;
        this.Description = default;
    }

    public static PacketWithPropertySerializer Deserialize(ref System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer)
    {
        var id = SpanReader.ReadInt32(ref buffer);
        var name = FourSer.Generated.Internal.__FourSer_Generated_Serializers.FourSer_Tests_GeneratorTestCases_PropertyLevelSerializer_MyCustomStringSerializer.Deserialize(ref buffer);
        var description = SpanReader.ReadString(ref buffer);
        var obj = new PacketWithPropertySerializer(id, name, description);
        return obj;
    }

    public static PacketWithPropertySerializer Deserialize(System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer)
    {
        return Deserialize(ref buffer);
    }

    public static PacketWithPropertySerializer Deserialize(System.IO.Stream stream)
    {
        var id = StreamReader.ReadInt32(stream);
        var name = FourSer.Generated.Internal.__FourSer_Generated_Serializers.FourSer_Tests_GeneratorTestCases_PropertyLevelSerializer_MyCustomStringSerializer.Deserialize(stream);
        var description = StreamReader.ReadString(stream);
        var obj = new PacketWithPropertySerializer(id, name, description);
        return obj;
    }

    public static void Serialize(PacketWithPropertySerializer obj, ref System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        if (obj is null) return;
        SpanWriter.WriteInt32(ref data, (int)(obj.Id));
        var bytesWritten_Name = FourSer.Generated.Internal.__FourSer_Generated_Serializers.FourSer_Tests_GeneratorTestCases_PropertyLevelSerializer_MyCustomStringSerializer.Serialize(obj.Name, data);
        data = data.Slice(bytesWritten_Name);
        SpanWriter.WriteString(ref data, obj.Description);
    }

    public static void Serialize(PacketWithPropertySerializer obj, System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        Serialize(obj, ref data);
    }

    public static void Serialize(PacketWithPropertySerializer obj, System.IO.Stream stream)
    {
        if (obj is null) return;
        StreamWriter.WriteInt32(stream, (int)(obj.Id));
        FourSer.Generated.Internal.__FourSer_Generated_Serializers.FourSer_Tests_GeneratorTestCases_PropertyLevelSerializer_MyCustomStringSerializer.Serialize(obj.Name, stream);
        StreamWriter.WriteString(stream, obj.Description);
    }
